description: This file defines a React functional component 'ProjectCard' that renders a UI card for displaying Jira project details, including project icon, avatar, description, lead, category, and various project properties. It imports React and several icon components, along with a type definition for JiraProject.

methods.name: getProjectTypeIcon
methods.description: Returns an emoji icon string based on the project type key.

methods.name: getProjectUrl
methods.description: Constructs and returns the URL to the Jira project browsing page based on the domain and project key.
